questions.questionEn: Which is the smallest state in India?
questions.questionHi: भारत का सबसे छोटा राज्य कौन सा है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Goa is the smallest state in India by area.

questions.questionEn: What is the currency of Japan?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: The currency of Japan is Yen.
